As a result of electronic inventions such as the computer and television, people do less physical activity, and this is having a negative effect on their health.
To what extent do you agree or disagree
text: DUE TO THE CREATION OF TECHNOLOGY, THERE IS SAID TO BE A REDUCTION IN HUMANS BODILY MOBILITY, HAVING A HARMFUL IMPACT ON THEIR PHYSIOLOGICAL WELLBEING. IN MY  OPINION, IT'S TRUE BECAUSE OF DEPENDENCY ON GADGETS, AUTOMOBILES AND ROBOTS.

AFTER THE INTRODUCTION OF ELECTRONIC APPLIANCES SUCH AS VIDEO GAMES, A WHOLE LOT OF PEOPLE FOUND IT FASCINATING AND HIGHLY INDULGING. HOWEVER, A GREAT PART OF THEIR SPARE TIME WAS ALLOCATED TO IT. IT IS SAID TO BE VERY DETRIMENTAL TO HEALTH BECAUSE IT INVOLVED LITTLLE OR NO MOVEMENT. FOR THIS REASON, LESS AND LESS CARDIOVASCULAR FUNCTION. THE DOCTOR ADVICED ME TO TRY AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE TO MOVE AROUND FOR FEW HOURS DAILY, I WAS SO DISTRAUGHT AND DID NOT HEED TO HIS WORD AND SPENT ALL MY DAYS WATCHING TELEVISION. CONSEQUENTLY, I HAD A PRESSURE SORE DUE TO SITTING DOWN ALL DAY AND IT WAS A COMPLICATION THAT COULD HAVE EASILY BEEN AVOIDED.
